Title: 37799 - # Things You Should Know About Heat Pump Maintenance
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 things to know about heat pump maintenance and up keep. You can discuss what is needed to keep the heat pump running efficiently, but just mention simple tasks like changing the filters. Larger, more difficult tasks you should always hire a professional for. You can mention the client blog link (http://www.custommechanical.com/blog/best-practices-for-optimal-heat-pump-operation-and-maintenance) anywhere in the article when talking about heat pump maintenance. Your audience consists of people interested in home maintenance and improving their home in general.
